name: Bookface Inc.
description:
Welcome to BOOKFACE Inc.
Work for us to save the future...or save yourself...
Play using keyboard only.
**jump scare alerts**

Game Design  :  PotatoCat (https://twitter.com/oPotatoCat)
Art                        : Sphyra (https://twitter.com/sphyraa)
Music from      : https://dova-s.jp/?fbclid=IwAR1eb_jIAKkTA1I6PNJfoH8pq3IZzp_fxF6wRe6LJgylSDL40FZ3...
Thanks for checking the game out.
This game is made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 with the theme of "This is not real"
Due to technical issue, we are unable to upload the game in WebGL.
